import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';
import AliasNFT from '../../_admonitions/_alias_nft_wallet.md';

Alias and NFT addresses play a significant role in decentralized systems, particularly in managing and identifying various assets.
Unlike traditional addresses associated with specific user accounts, those addresses are specifically assigned to Alias
and NFT outputs. These outputs have their own unique addresses, enabling them to hold their respective base tokens or
any other native assets. This means that you could transfer ownership of all the assets controlled by the such an address
by transferring its output.

<AliasNFT />
<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx).
2. Request the account's balance by calling the [`Account.sync()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.sync) function.
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.rs#L38
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first [`AliasOutput`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/alias/struct.AliasOutput.html) related to Alice's
   account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.rs#L43
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the Alias address using the [`AliasAddress.to_bech32()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.AliasAddress.html#impl-ToBech32Ext-for-T)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.rs#L47
```

</div>

5. Request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the [`Client::utils::request_funds_from_faucet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/utils/fn.request_funds_from_faucet.html) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.rs#L48
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Request the account's balance by calling the [`Account.sync()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
    https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request-funds.ts#L35
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first [`AliasOutput`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AliasOutput.md) related to Alice's
   account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request-funds.ts#L42
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the Alias' address using the [`Utils.aliasIdToBech32()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#aliasidtobech32)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request-funds.ts#L46-L49
```

</div>

5. Request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the [`Client.requestFundsFromFaucet()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Client.md#requestfundsfromfaucet) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request-funds.ts#L50-L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Request the account's balance by calling the [`Account.sync()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.py#L18
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first `AliasOutput` related to Alice's account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.py#L24
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the [`AliasAddress`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/address.md#aliasaddress-objects) using the [`Utils.alias_id_to_bech32()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#alias_id_to_bech32)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.py#L28-L29
```

</div>

5. Request funds to the `FAUCET_URL` you defined in the `.env` file by calling the
   [`Client.request_funds_from_faucet`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/client/_utils.md#request_funds_from_faucet)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/request_funds.py#L30-L31
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Balance before requesting funds on alias address: 1000000000
Alias Id: 0x60ad63a97179af7012809279140aabe34eafe37ef912b9a5a33fc7f8c58a20a7
{"address":"rms1pps26cafw9u67uqjszf8j9q24035atlr0mu39wd95vlu07x93gs2wf8n29a","waitingRequests":1}

Balance after requesting funds on alias address: 2300000000
```
